push

public void push(Message msg,
                 long timestamp)
          throws MessageStorageException
Description copied from class: MessageStorage
Push a new message in the storage. Shall the message be already in the storage, an exception will be raised.

Specified by:
push in class MessageStorage
Parameters:
msg - the message to push in.
timestamp - the message due timestamp.
Throws:
MessageStorageException - if the Message is already in the storage.

pop

public Message pop(long timestamp)
Description copied from class: MessageStorage
Pops out a message from the storage with a due date earlier than the provided timestamp. The returned message is not removed from the storage but is moved into a special storage area from where can be deleted using the removeMessage method.

Specified by:
pop in class MessageStorage
Parameters:
timestamp - the timestamp
Returns:
the first message in the storage with msg.timestamp <= timestamp

removeMessage

public void removeMessage(Message msg)
                   throws MessageStorageException
Description copied from class: MessageStorage
Removes a message from the storage special stocking area of messages previously returned using one of the pop methods.

Specified by:
removeMessage in class MessageStorage
Parameters:
msg - the message to remove.
Throws:
MessageStorageException - if the message is not in the storage special stocking area.

getAllMessages

public Message[] getAllMessages()
Description copied from class: MessageStorage
Retruns all the messages in the storage including messages in the special area. Returned messages are not moved in the storage special stocking area and so cannot be removed from the storage before popping them out first.

Specified by:
getAllMessages in class MessageStorage
Returns:
all the messages in the storage.

printAllMessages

Specified by:
